original_text: They helped David against the band of raiders, for they were all mighty men of valor and were commanders in the army.
korean_text: 이 무리가 다윗을 도와 도둑 떼를 쳤으니 그들은 다 큰 용사요 군대 지휘관이 됨이었더라

sentences.original_text: They helped David against the band of raiders
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다윗을 도와 침략자들의 무리를 대적했습니다

sentences.original_text: for they were all mighty men of valor
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 모두 용맹한 용사였기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and were commanders in the army
